body_html:
I have the same problem with GTX 1080.
It takes about 5 minutes to call the method cuda() for the first time

import torch
x = torch.randn(4,5)
x.cuda()

I use conda install pytorch torchvision -c soumith to install the pytorch. Both Python 2.4 and Python 3.5 have the same problem.

body:
I have the same problem with GTX 1080.
It takes about 5 minutes to call the method cuda() for the first time
```python
import torch
x = torch.randn(4,5)
x.cuda()
```

I use `conda install pytorch torchvision -c soumith` to install the pytorch. Both Python 2.4 and Python 3.5 have the same problem.
